label: stations
subtitle: List stations seismic INGV
description:
This endpoint retrieves information about all seismic monitoring stations available in the TerraQuake API. It provides users with detailed metadata on each station, including its network code, site name, geographic coordinates (latitude and longitude), elevation, operational status, and start date.

These stations are part of the seismic monitoring network used to detect and record earthquake events in real time.

Query Parameters:
- limit: (Optional) The number of stations to return per page. Defaults to 50 if not specified.
- page: (Optional) The page number of the results to retrieve. Defaults to 1 if not specified.

label: code station
subtitle: By code station
description:
This endpoint retrieves detailed information for a specific seismic monitoring station, identified by its unique station code.

It returns station metadata such as network, site name, geographic coordinates, elevation, and operational period.

Query Parameters:
- code: (Required) The station code to search for (case-insensitive).

label: GeoJSON
subtitle: Full station dataset (GeoJSON format)
description:
This endpoint retrieves the complete list of seismic monitoring stations in GeoJSON format.

It is primarily intended for mapping, GIS visualization, and geospatial applications. Each feature includes coordinates (latitude, longitude, elevation) and station metadata such as network, site name, and operational status.

Supports optional pagination using `limit` and `page`.
